root.name: Marvel Super Hero Squad: The Infinity Gauntlet
root.description: Gameplay Marvel Super Hero Squad: The Infinity Gauntlet is in the same scheme as the last game, allowing the player to choose a Squad member and teaming them up to make a Super Hero Squad as it were. There will be three game modes consisting of a Story Mode, a Freeplay Mode and a Challenge Mode. You will also be able to "Hero Up" and play cooperatively. A new puzzle element has been added to the series, giving the players more of a challenge this time around. Only a few playable characters have been announced at this time: Iron Man, Spider-Man, Hulk, Silver Surfer, Wolverine, Falcon and Thor. Plot Revolving around the plot of Season Two of the television series, Marvel Super Hero Squad: The Infinity Gauntlet has the team fighting Doctor Doom and his Lethal Legion from getting the Infinity Guantlet, procuring the Infinity Stones and saving the world from the evil Thanos.
